EmailTemplate.name: Global_Nurture_Jetwave_ATR.201705_Global_Email_Jetwave_ATR_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Abigail. She’ll Change the Way You See the Connected Aircraft ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Connectivity for Airlines Means Much More than a Great Passenger Experience <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a1lf8ANBHAw]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, The Connected Aircraft powered by Honeywell JetWave is changing the way the airline industry uses data. Airline executive Abigail <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a1lf8ANBHAw]]> shows you how Honeywell’s connectivity offerings can save time, save money and improve efficiency for airline operations.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
